name: DEBUFF
description: Nine fantasy heroes await your leadership in single player campaign, multiplayer battles and raids and last but not least, killing football game! Gain experience to level up, assign skill points, purchase bonus buffs to fight DEBUFF. Oh, and don't forget to kill Hellga!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of VRAM. Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1GB of VRAM. Storage: 500 MB available space
